about_the_game:
To thank everyone for your support and positive feedback during the early stages of Guardians of the Sanctree, we are offering this free DLC to all players who already own the game!

DLC Includes:

- Mechanic's Wrench

- Feather Blade

- Trash Can Hammer

- Broom Hammer

- Octopus Multi-Tool

- Feather Shovel

- Feather Pickaxe

- Feather Helmet

- Feather Armor

- Feather Shoes

*Please make sure to claim these items in time! The DLC claim period will close on December 20th!

name: Guardians of the Sanctree - Exclusive Launch Reward for Early Players—Our sincere thanks to those who supported us from day one.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: To thank everyone for your support and positive feedback during the early stages of Guardians of the Sanctree, we are offering this free DLC to all players who already own the game! Please claim it in time! This DLC will only be available until December 20th, 2024.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Russian, German, Japanese, Thai, Korean, Traditional Chinese
